argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | qtoptop.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ F Fn X ) -> J e. Top ) |
| 3 |  | #P_id | |- ( F Fn X -> F Fn X ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_topopn | |- ( J e. Top -> X e. J ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fnex | |- ( ( F Fn X /\ X e. J ) -> F e. _V ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_syl2anr | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ F Fn X ) -> F e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fnfun | |- ( F Fn X -> Fun F ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ F Fn X ) -> Fun F ) |
| 9 |  | #P_qtoptop2 | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ F e. _V /\ Fun F ) -> ( J qTop F ) e. Top ) |
| 10 | 2, 6, 8, 9 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ F Fn X ) -> ( J qTop F ) e. Top ) |
